detail_desc: Jumper in a soft, fine knit with detachable ties, gathers in the sides for best fit and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knitted cashmere scarf with ribbing on the short sides. Size 50x170 cm.
Cotton canvas shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake leg pockets with a flap.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, pleats at the front and a V-shaped opening at the back with wide ties at the back of the neck. Unlined.
Mittens in a soft knit with ribbed, foldover cuffs and a fleece lining. Size 0-6M without thumbs.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in a patterned weave with an elasticated waist. Unlined.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short sleeves, a mesh yoke at the top and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Shimmering dance shoes with an elastic strap over the foot. Cotton linings and insoles and soft suede soles.
Short, flared skirt in sturdy satin. High waist with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip in one side and gathers at the top for added width. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly, front pockets and decorative seams on the back pockets. Flared legs with raw-edge hems.

Imitation suede bomber jacket with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. One inner pocket, side pockets with a concealed press-stud, a zipped pocket on one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, wrapover front with ties at one side, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
A-line skirt in stretch cotton twill with fake pockets and buttons at the front. Unlined.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Short, high-waisted, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a press-stud and concealed zip at one side. Unlined.

Knee-length cargo shorts in a stretch cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets with decorative seams, flap back pockets with concealed press-studs and flap leg pockets with a pleat and concealed press-studs.
Short imitation suede skirt with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Sleeveless blouse in a soft viscose weave with a narrow collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Slim-fit biker jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Front and back pockets, and legs with decorative stitching and narrow hems.
Yoga socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with anti-slip protectors on the soles. Holes for the toes and crossover straps over the feet.
A pair of hoop earrings decorated with faceted plastic beads. Diameter 2.5 cm.
Transparent silicone smartphone case with an adjustable fabric neck cord.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Suit trousers in a linen weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Fitted top in soft linen jersey with long sleeves and a round neckline with narrow ribbing.
Tie in a textured silk weave. Width 5.5 cm.
Long T-shirt in jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Shirt in a checked cotton weave with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Small purse in imitation leather with a zip at the top that continues down the short sides. Four card slots. Lined. Size 2x9x11.5 cm.
Fitted, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose and nylon blend containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped top in soft cotton jersey with concealed elastication at the front of the top.

Set with a top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend and leggings in cotton jersey. Top in a slightly longer style with dropped shoulder seams, long sleeves, discreet front pockets and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The ribbing at the hem is slightly shorter at the front and has two slits. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist. The cotton content of the set is organic.
Short-sleeved, jacquard-knit dress in a wool blend containing some alpaca wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pull-on jeans in stretch, supersoft denim in a loose fit with an elasticated drawstring waist. Fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket, and elasticated hems.
Fitted top in jersey with short sleeves.
Large, round sunglasses with slim frames and sidepieces in metal and plastic. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective, shimmering metallic lenses.

Calf-length kaftan in a viscose and linen weave with a panel in a contrasting colour with narrow pleats around the opening and a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Wide, 3/4-length puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the cuffs, pockets in the side seams and slits in the sides.

detail_desc: T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Mug in transparent printed plastic with a screw top and straw. Diameter at the top 10 cm, height 15.5 cm.
Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a tapered waist, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Sports bralette in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Racer back with a cut-out detail. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Jersey cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.

Cropped, sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a small stand-up collar and racer back. Integral sports bra with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and an elasticated hem.
Shopper in transparent plastic with round metal handles at the top. Size 10x28.5x33.5 cm.
Pre-tied bow ties in woven fabric with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.
Fine-knit jumper in a viscose blend with a soft brushed finish and a round neck. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jacket and pair of trousers in narrow-wale organic cotton corduroy. Jacket with notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket, flap welt front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Unlined. Trousers with an adjustable elasticated waist, pleats at the top, fly with a button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless playsuit in a soft viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, mesh ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.
5-pocket, low rise, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a zip fly and button and tapered legs.

Fully lined bikini top with a tie detail at the front, underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft cotton. Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with matt press-studs on one shoulder, twisted seams at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers in stretch jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in airy jersey with a print motif on the front, braided detail at the top and asymmetric raw-edge hem.
Tights with built-in support to lift the bottom. Black in 30 denier and light amber in 15 denier.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative, tasselled drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with elastication in the shaft.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif and rib-trimmed neckline.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy and covered elastication at the hems.
Poncho in an airy, patterned weave with an open front and long fringes at the hem.
Leggings in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a regular waist with covered elastication.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh section over the foot and a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
All-in-one suit in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
KELZUKI x H&M. Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a rounded front, short dolman sleeves and no fasteners.
Long, wide jeans in sturdy denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, side and back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.

Pile-lined hooded jacket in soft cotton jersey and a pair of trousers in fleece. Jacket with a hood that has sewn-on ears, and a concealed zip down the front with a chin guard. Trousers with wide, foldover jersey ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.

V-neck shirt in a Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and an open chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Relaxed fit.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar and lace covered section at the back with a cut-out section at the top.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, hood, zip down the front, side pockets and a small appliqué at the top. Contrasting colour jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Long cardigan in cotton jersey with raw edges, draped notch lapels with a press-stud, and welt side pockets.

Slim-fit, softshell trousers in water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a high, fleece-lined waist, elasticated back panel, zip fly and adjustable braces with a hook and loop fastening. Flared legs with shaping seams at the knees and reinforced hems. Fleece lining. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
